head: Finance
name: Time Value of Money
about: Calculate the time value of money using various equations.

name: Interest Calculator
about: A collection of formulas that calculate parameters for an environment with an interest rate.

head: Science
name: Psychart
about: Plot thermodynamic conditions of air on a psychrometric chart, optionally displaying comfort zones.

name: Unit Converter
about: Convert anything to anything! Build complex units and analyze dimensions.

name: Dimensional Playground
about: Presents a live editor with the `dimensional` package ready to use.

name: File to Data URL
about: Encode any file as a data URL that can be directly embedded into a source code file.

head: Gaming
name: Wordle Helper
about: Filters the wordle dictionary based on your previous guesses to help you make an informed next guess.

name: Hearts Helper
about: Help counts cards specifically for the game, Hearts.

name: Pokemon Go Catch Rate
about: A catch rate calculator for the mobile game, Pokemon Go.
